text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) OthmanAdi/planning-with-files | 95% | stars now 7360 → est 15169 (range 15122-15216)
   https://github.com/OthmanAdi/planning-with-files
2) vercel-labs/agent-browser | 94% | stars now 878 → est 8397 (range 8372-8422)
   https://github.com/vercel-labs/agent-browser
3) kepano/obsidian-skills | 94% | stars now 5570 → est 11196 (range 11153-11239)
   https://github.com/kepano/obsidian-skills
4) jarrodwatts/claude-hud | 91% | stars now 1963 → est 3758 (range 3733-3783)
   https://github.com/jarrodwatts/claude-hud
5) ophub/fnnas | 90% | stars now 1553 → est 4079 (range 4054-4104)
   https://github.com/ophub/fnnas

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
